Please note that boots/shoes should be plain, black, sensible and comfortable. No logos please.

Please note that ear-rings, bracelets, necklaces and make-up are not allowed in school.

Please label all clothing with your child’s name and class to help us to marry up lost property with the appropriate child/family.
